Esto lo hago con la certeza de que brindar un espacio favorable en el desarrollo de los niños desde pequeños puede contribuir significativamente en las decisiones que ellos pueden tomar en el mañana, así como a lo que se pueden dedicar.
Todo esto ligado con un trabajo con la familia, que son quienes tienen la mayor influencia en ellos. Y al hacerlo desde pequeños, se estaría forjando niños que tengan una visión diferente y puedan ser entes como la sociedad necesita. Les pido pues que me ayuden a cumplir este ideal y lograr mi meta de ser un gran psicólogo en beneficio de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Jeckson Luis is a young student of educational psychology. He is requesting a loan to pay for his tuition fees. This is his story: 

My Name is Jeckson Luis. I was born in Bonao, in the province of Monseñor Nouel, and I live here with my parents and brothers. By the mercy of God, I had the opportunity to live and grow up in the city of my birth.

At the end of 2008, when I was in my first semester of my bachelor studies, the company in which my father works had to lay of people because of the situation they were in, all because of the falling currency and the production costs. My father was one of the laid off employees. Thanks to God, I was given the opportunity to finish my bachelor's degree in the school I was in because the company paid the majority of the monthly cost.

At the university of UAPA I decided to study clinical psychology and later changed to educational psychology because I had the strong wish to do social services. This came from my relationship with God, that I established during my bachelor studies and in many years as an acolyte in my church.

Without the help of Kiva, I would not be able to continue studying because we do not yet have the resources to do so.

I have an interest in offering help with the primary vision of creating a positive space, where kids will have the opportunity to develop themselves in different areas like music, art, theater, manual crafts, cooking, motivational and self-esteem workshops, and so on. I do this because I am convinced that offering a favorable space for the development of children from a young age contributes significantly to the decisions they make in the morning on how to spend their time.

All of this will be tied to the work in the families, who are the ones that have the greatest influence on them. And by doing this from a young age, it is possible to form kids who have a different outlook and into people that are needed by society. I ask you to help me with fulfilling this vision and achieve my goal to be a great psychologist for the benefit of society.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees of higher education.

loans.name: Benkan Group

texts.fr:
La femme qui est assise  est Mah. 
Mah est une analphabète résidante au Mali.  Elle  vend des galettes et de baignés depuis 10 ans ; elle est âgé de 43 ans  mariée et  mère de cinq(5) enfants dont  une fille, ils sont âgés de 25 à 6 ans. Parmi ses cinq enfants deux sont à  l’école et les trois autres en aventure. Son mari est un bouché et elle a pour rêve de construire une maison en dure. Elle a fait recourt à l’IMF pour augmenter la quantité de haricot et huile  pour la vente de galettes et de baignés.  Elle s’approvisionne en haricot et en  huile au marché locale. Elle peut avoir un profit de 25 000 FCFA par cycle. Le profit  la permet de prendre en charge les frais scolaires, médicaux et habillement de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The woman who is sitting down is Mah. Mah is an illiterate resident of Mali. She has been selling cakes and doughnuts for 10 years. She is 43 years old, married and the mother of 5 children, one of whom is a girl. The children are aged between 25 and 6 years old. Two of her 5 children go to school and the other three are off on adventure. Her husband is a butcher and she dreams of eventually being able to build a home.

She is turning to the MFI in order to be able to buy more beans and oil for her business selling cakes and doughnuts. She gets the beans and oil at the local market. She can make a profit of 25 000 francs per loan cycle. This profit enables her to cover her children's educational, medical and clothing expenses.

loans.use: to buy more beans and oil to sell cakes and doughnuts

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos de 35 años, tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar vendiendo cerveza y licor en fiestas de pueblos, actividad en la que no continúo porque lo alejaba de su familia, al tener conocimiento en reparación de motocicletas consideró que podía prestar estos servicios e inauguro su taller de reparación de motocicletas, en el que ofrece servicios adicionales de llantería y lavadero, así mismo este polifacético hombre alquila mesas, sillas y manteles para recepciones y eventos.  Juan Carlos considera que ha tenido éxito en sus negocios y que le han permitido estar más cerca de su familia en compañía de su cónyuge y de sus cuatro hijos menores de edad que necesitan de su amor y dedicación.  Todos los días a partir de las 7:30 a.m. hasta las 6 p.m. sus clientes pueden acceder los servicios que ofrece, en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en la compra de una mesa hidráulica, sillas y telas para mesones.  Su meta  de negocio a futuro es comprar un lote para construir su propio local, donde pueda funcionar su taller y a nivel personal desea continuar ofreciéndoles bienestar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 35 years old and he had the opportunity to work selling beer and liquor at town parties, an occupation which he did not continue because it kept him away from his family. 

Since he knows how to repair motorcycles, he considered that he could provide these services and began his own motorcycle repair workshop, in which he offers additional tire and washing services. In this same place this versatile man rents tables, chairs, and linens for receptions and events. 

Juan Carlos feels that his businesses have been successful and that this has allowed him to be closer to his family in the company of his partner and their 4 minor children that need his love and devotion. Every day from 7:30am until 6pm his customers can access the services that he offers, and now he is applying for a Kiva loan. 

This is the first funding that he is doing with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo to invest in the purchase of a hydraulic table, chairs, and fabrics for inns. 

His future business goal is to purchase a lot to build his own venue where his workshop could function, and on a personal level he would like to continue providing well-being to his children.

loans.use: to purchase a hydraulic table, chairs and fabric for inns

loans.name: Mira

texts.ru: Мира, 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей, все дети школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Миры- среднее образование, с 2000 года Мира занимается сельским хозяйством, на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве есть 4 коровы, 20 овец. На земельном наделе мерою 4,00 ГА Мира и ее муж выращивают картофель и люцерну для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 18,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Мира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и хочет провести в доме систему отопления.
texts.en: Mira is 32 years old, married, and raises four children with her husband. All of their children are of school or pre-school age. Mira has a secondary education. Mira has been farming since 2000 and today she has four cows and twenty sheep. Mira and her husband grow potatoes and alfalfa for sale on a 4.0 hectare plot of land. The monthly income is 18,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Mira has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy some cows to increase the size of her herd. Mira plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in further increasing her number of domestic livestock and wants to install a heating system in her home.

loans.use: to buy some cattle to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Jose Arle

texts.es:
José, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, no continuo estudiando porque desde que tenía 12 años de edad ha trabajado duro para ayudarle a su madre; ahora ha logrado comprar su propio terreno y construir su casa, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, mientras él trabaja para llevar el sustento a su casa.

José, siembra 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 10,500 metros cuadrados de frijol; se dedica también a  la crianza de ganado, en este trabajo le ayudan su dos hijo y su yerno, su horario es de 5:00 hasta la 1:00 de la tarde.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos, los cuales necesita comprar antes de que el invierno arruine el acceso a la comunidad.

El sueño de José, es ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y sean reconocidos en su comunidad.
texts.en:
José, age 37, went to school through the sixth grade.  He did not continue in school because after he was 12 years old he worked hard to help his mother.  He has now managed to buy his own land and to build his house.  His wife devotes herself to the household chores while he works bringing sustenance to his home.

José plants 7,000 square meters of corn and 10,500 square meters of beans.  He also raises livestock.  His two sons and his son-in-law help him with this work.  His schedule is from five in the morning until one in the afternoon.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy compost and fertilizers.  He needs to buy them before winter destroys access to the community.

José’s dream is to see his children become professionals that are well-known in his community.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is a 40-year-old Lebanese married woman, a mother of three children. She is a talented tailor who has been working in this type of business for the past 16 years. She produces different clothing designs and makes repairs as well. 

And today, she wants to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a new sewing machine and a new table. 

She intends to achieve more improvements and enhancements in her life to reach her particular goals, finally and wisely.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine and a new table

loans.name: Irma Elena

texts.es:
Irma, comenta que con el crédito anterior pudo mejorar la venta de mariscos, teniendo en su momento mejores ingresos y con las ganancias a suplido necesidades familiares, decidió cambiar de actividad económica para tener un mejor progreso, actualmente vende productos de la canasta básica.
Por el apoyo que siente que la institución le brinda se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar granos básicos, huevos aceite, bebidas, jabón, cerillos, lejía, etc., para tener un inventario con el que pueda disminuir las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Irma says that with the previous loan she was able to improve her seafood sales.  In due course she had better income, and the profits supplied the family’s necessities.  She decided to change businesses in order to make better progress.  She is currently selling basic needs items.

Because of the support that she feels the institution provides, she has decided to request a new loan to buy basic grains, eggs, cooking oil, drinks, soap, matches, and bleach, etc. in order to have an inventory with which she is able to meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, cooking oil, drinks, soap, matches, and bleach, etc. in order to meet the needs of her customers.

loans.name: Marlon Anibal

texts.es:
Marlon, necesita de un financiamiento para poder comprar abono, insecticidas y semilla de maíz mejorada para continuar trabajando la tierra, espera mantener la continuidad de su progreso.
El préstamo anterior le dado resultados positivos ya que la cosecha de maíz y frijol de la temporada pasada ha sido muy abundante y de calidad, las condiciones económicas están mejorando y su familia vive en óptimas condiciones.
texts.en:
Marlon needs a loan in order to be able to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and improved corn seeds to continue working the land.  He hopes to maintain the continuity of his progress.

The previous loan gave him positive results because last season’s corn and bean harvest has been very abundant and of good quality.  His financial situation is improving, and his family lives in optimal conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and improved corn seeds to continue working the land.

loans.name: Reinaldo De Jesús

texts.es:
Reinaldo desde hace 10 años se dedica a la producción agrícola y diariamente se levanta para trabajar y atender sus tierras en las cuales tiene cultivos.
Es una actividad aprendida de manera empírica y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas y habilidades en este campo.

Adicionalmente genera ingresos alternos gracias a su trabajo como jornalero.
Hoy en día se siente orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir con su esfuerzo y se siente muy agradecido con la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva por las oportunidades que le brindan de progresar.

El pide un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, riegos y pesticidas, de este modo mantener sus tierras en optimas condiciones para los cultivos.

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y allí poder disfrutar de su vejez al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Reinaldo, for the past 10 years, has worked in agricultural production and daily gets up to work and care for his land where he has crops.  It is work he learned through practice and, little by little, he has been perfecting his techniques and skills in this field.

In addition, he gets alternative income thanks to his work as a laborer.

Today, he is proud of what he has been able to build with his efforts and is very grateful to Corporación Interactuar and the Kiva lenders for the opportunities that they offer him to progress.

He asks for a loan to invest it in the purchase of manure, pesticides, and pay for irrigation, in this way to maintain his land in optimal condition for the crops.

His greatest dream is to have his own house and be able to enjoy his old age there, at his wife's side.

loans.use: to purchase manure, pesticides, and pay for irrigation and, in this way, maintain his land in optimal condition for the crops.

loans.name: William Esau

texts.es: William de 22 años de edad es un joven luchador que vive junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 1 año de edad. William a pesar de los problemas que puede enfrentar siempre está buscando la manera de mostrar su carisma, él se desempeña como mecánico automotriz, además trabaja en una venta de lubricantes para vehículos, lo que le permite obtener excelentes ingresos económicos. William se encuentra preocupado, ya que su vivienda luego de unas tormentas quedo destruida, por lo que ha tenido que hacer una de cartones y plástico, la cual no es muy segura, por lo que ha decidido volver a construir su vivienda y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre para construir su vivienda, y que esta pueda ser un poco más segura.
texts.en:
William, age 22, is a tenacious young man, who lives with his life partner and their little one year old son.  In spite of the problems that he may face, William is always looking for the way to display his charisma.  He works as an auto mechanic.  He also works selling automobile lubricants.  This allows him to get excellent earnings.

William is worried because his house was destroyed after some storms.  Therefore, he has had to make one from cardboard and plastic, which is not very safe.  That is why he has decided to rebuild his house.  In order to do so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, nails, and wire in order to build his house.  With this the house will be able to be a little more secure.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, nails, and wire in order to build his house and make it a little safer.

loans.name: Maritza Oristila

texts.es:
La señora  Maritza de 27  años de edad es casada,  tiene dos hijos   que dependen de ella,  vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 05   años  a la actividad de  venta de tamales,  pan, y queso su venta es ambulante, sus clientes son los amigos y personas que visita.
Doña Maritza es una mujer trabajadora y desea sacar adelante a su familia está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de hojas de plátano, maíz, harina, leña y gallinas que son la materia prima para elaborar sus productos, con el apoyo de este préstamo desea comprar estos productos para así preparar las golosinas y obtener las ganancias necesarias para salir adelante con su familia. 
Su sueño es mejorar su casa  y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Mayo del   2015.
texts.en:
Maritza, age 27, is married and has two children, who are dependent upon her.  She lives in a community in San Lorenzo in southern Honduras.  She has her own house.  She has been selling tamales, bread and cheese in an itinerant manner for five years.  Her customers are the friends and people who visit her.

Maritza is a hard-working woman, and she wishes to get her family ahead.  She is requesting the loan to buy banana leaves, corn, flour, firewood, and chicken, which are the raw materials used to make her products.  With the support of this loan she wishes to buy these products to prepare the delicacies to get the earnings needed to get ahead with her family.

Her dream is to improve her house and her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – May, 2015.

loans.use: to buy banana leaves, corn, flour, firewood, and chicken, which are the raw materials used to make her products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase carpentry machines.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Help Teresita see a glimpse of a better future through your generosity today. With a dream to have her own name in the tailoring industry and add more businesses for additional income, she works very hard to help her husband sustain the family. 

This is Teresita and aside from the tailoring business she is currently involved in, she also operates a food stall where she had spent her previous loan. She was able to repay the loan, and she faithfully got a loan worth PHP 20,000 recently. This couldn't be possible without your help, lenders. Thank you so much! Through you, she was able to buy enough supplies of ingredients needed for her food stall business, thus, paving a way to a better remedy for their family's daily expenses. 

This time, she wants to improve the other business. She would like to ask again a loan worth PHP 20,000. This would be a big help for her family. She would use this specific amount to improve the inventory by acquiring an additional sewing machine. She knows that with this purpose, clothing production would be more easier. 

She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week. It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital, and repay their microfinance loans.

loans.use: to improve the inventory by acquiring an additional sewing machine.

loans.name: Erlene

texts.en:
Erlene is 45 years old and has three children. She is married and all of her children are in school.

Erlene is in the agricultural (poultry) business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry.

Erlene has been in the poultry for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her poultry.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elsie is 51 years old and has two children who are in school.

Elsie has a dry goods business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more items like bags, perfume, body lotion and other personal products.

Elsie has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like bags, perfume, body lotion and other personal products.

loans.name: Orfelina Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ella es Orfelina una mujer que quiere hacerte un pedido, ella necesita una ayuda para iniciar un negocio, no logra emplearse, ella sonríe y quiere superarse, es madre cabeza de familia y busca generar la mejor calidad de vida posible a su hogar donde las esperan dos hijos.

Orfelina quiere iniciar un negocio de cría de cerdos, el préstamo lo usara para comprar los insumos con los que construiría ella misma con ayuda de sus hijos las cocheras, comprara animales para abastecer las cocheras.

La importancia del préstamo recae en que si apoyas a Orfelina estarás brindándole la oportunidad a una empresaria de luchar por un mejor futuro para sus hijos.
texts.en:
This is Orfelina, a woman who wants to make a request of you. She needs some help to begin her business. She wasn't able to find a job. She smiles and wants to improve herself; she is the head of the household and seeks to create the best possible quality of life in her home where two children wait for her. 

Orfelina wants to undertake a business raising pigs. She will use the loan to purchase the supplies with which she will build the pigpens herself with the help of her children, she will purchase animals to stock the pigpens. 

The importance of the loan goes back to this: if you support Orfelina you will be offering the opportunity to a businesswoman to fight for a better future for her children.

loans.use: to undertake a business raising pigs to look for the sustenance for her family, since she is the head of the household.

loans.name: Arturo Elias

texts.es:
Gracias a convenios, ayudas, asesorías, a brindar seguridad hoy un joven llamado Arturo está a punto de dar un paso muy importante en su vida, Arturo quien tiene tan solo 22 años de edad se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para iniciar un negocio de cría de peces con  el compromiso y reto de ser el empresario número uno de su vereda.

 Con el ánimo de ayudar a su madre y ser el hombre de la familia Arturo solicita un préstamo para iniciar su negocio de cría de peces, el monto es significativo ya que necesita construir los pozos, abastecerlos y comprar el alimento de los peces.
texts.en:
Thanks to agreements, support, and advice, to offer security today, a young man named Arturo is about to take a very important step in his life. Arturo, who is only 22 years old, is asking for a loan to undertake a business raising fish with the commitment and challenge of being the first businessman in his neighborhood.

With the motivation to help his mother and be the man of the family, Arturo asks for a loan to undertake his business raising fish, the amount is a lot because he needs to build the tanks, stock them and purchase feed for the fish.

loans.use: to undertake a business raising fish, he will build the tanks, and purchase fish and feed.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, vive felizmente con su esposa y su hija de 15 años de edad, él tiene la responsabilidad de cubrir todas las necesidades de su grupo familiar, tiene como negocio una granja de pollos de engorde y también práctica la agricultura, estas actividades las aprendió de su hermano y tiene su negocio propio desde hace más de 15 años.
Invertirá en concentrado, para mejorar la alimentación de los pollos, su objetivo es mantenerlos saludables y robustos para que sea más fácil venderlos, espera que las ventas se mantengan, para generar mejores ingresos con los que pueda dar a su familia en estilo de estilo de vida más digno.
Don José tiene como visión administrar muy bien el crédito para resarcirlo sin dificultades en el tiempo acordado.
texts.en:
José lives happily with his wife and his 15 year old daughter.  He has the responsibility of covering his family’s expenses.  His business is a farm with chickens for fattening.  He also engages in agricultural work.  He learned these business activities from his brother, and he has had his own business for over 15 years.

He will use the loan to buy concentrated feed in order to improve the food for the chickens.  He objective is to keep them healthy and robust so that it is easier to sell them.  He hopes to maintain his sales in order to generate better earnings with which he will be able to give his family a more decent lifestyle.

José has a vision of using the loan very well in order to repay it without difficulties in the agreed upon time period.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed in order to improve the food for the chickens.

loans.name: Eulalia Maria

texts.es: Desde 1990 inicio con su negocio la señora Eulia de confecciones apostándole siempre a la marca propia, un negocio que le ha servido para mantener a su familia conformada por dos hijos uno de 18 y otra de 13, Eulia en el momento se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de telas e hilos, un préstamo que le permitirá seguir realizando su profesión y generando el sustento con el que lleva el alimento a su mesa cada día.
texts.en:
Back in 1990 Eulia started her dressmaking business, always positioning her own brand. The business has served to support her family, which is made up of two children, one who is 18 and the other is 13.

Eulia is currently requesting a loan to buy fabric and thread. This is a loan that will allow her to continue in her career while generating the support with which she can bring food to her family's table everyday.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread. A loan that will allow her to continue in her career.

loans.name: Jose Obdulio

texts.es:
Obdulio, de 62 años de edad, no estudio porque desde muy joven se dedicó a trabajar la tierra, para aportar ingresos para su familia,  porque cuando era joven no habían muchas posibilidades de estudiar, por eso tuvo que aprender a cultivar la tierra con su padre y luego se casó y tiene 3 hijos, mientras su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Obdulio, siembra 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz y 14 tareas de frijol, trabaja en su propia parcela y alquila una parte, sus cultivos están a unos minutos de su casa y él trabaja con sus dos hijos menores y su yerno.

Obdulio, necesita el crédito para comprar abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos, los cuales necesita comprar antes de que el invierno arruine la calle.

El sueño de Obdulio, es poder tener una vivienda digna, en donde pueda vivir de forma segura con sus hijos y su esposa.
texts.en:
Obdulio, age 62, did not go to school because he has worked the land ever since he was very young in order to contribute to the family income.  When he was young there were not many opportunities to go to school.  That is why he had to learn to cultivate the land with his father.  He later married, and he has three children.  His wife devotes herself to the household chores.

Obdulio cultivates 10,500 square meters of corn and 14 plots of beans.  He works his own land, and he rents another part.  His crops are a few minutes from his house.  He works with his two youngest sons and his son-in-law.

Obdulio needs the loan to buy compost and fertilizers for his crops.  He needs to buy them before the winter destroys the road.

Obdulio’s dream is to be able to have a decent house where he is able to live safely with his children and his wife.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is married, and she works hard to support her family.

Milagros has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 20,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy new supplies for her tailoring business.

Milagros has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva's lenders. 

Milagros hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new supplies for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Delmy Esperanza

texts.es:
Delmy, es madre soltera de dos hijos, tiene que luchar día con día para salir adelante con su familia, trabaja de forma independiente en el cultivo de maíz y frijol, su jornada de trabajo es de seis de la mañana a dos de la tarde, es un oficio que heredó de su familia y cuenta aproximadamente con 25 años de experiencia.
Necesita de un crédito para comprar insecticidas, abono y semilla mejorada de maíz y frijol para obtener una mejor cosecha, de esta manera espera tener suficiente producto para vender y atender nuevos clientes.
Los sueños que Delmy tiene son que sus hijos estudien a nivel superior para que tengan un futuro prometedor y reparar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Delmy is the single mother of two children.  She has to struggle day to day in order to get ahead with her family.  She works independently cultivating corn and beans.  Her work schedule is from six in the morning until two in the afternoon.  It is work that she inherited from her family, and she has approximately 25 years of experience.

She needs a loan to buy insecticides, fertilizer, and improved corn and bean seeds in order to get a better harvest.  This way she hopes to have enough products to sell and to tend to new customers.

Delmy’s dreams are for her children to get an advanced level of education so that they have a promising future and to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizer, and improved corn and bean seeds in order to get a better harvest.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, cultiva maíz y frijol, tanto para consumo familiar como para vender y obtener recursos económicos con los que puede cubrir otras necesidades de su hogar, los cultivos los realiza en terrenos arrendados, el oficio lo aprendió de sus padres e inicio a trabajar desde el año 1999, su ventaja es que la zona en que trabaja es apropiada para la agricultura. Vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y un hijo que está estudiando 6° grado. 
Invertirá en el pago del arrendamiento del terreno, en la chapoda y en insumos agrícolas para tener todo a su disposición cuando sea el tiempo justo para sembrar, pretende extender el área de cultivo y así aumentar las cosechas.
Sus objetivos son almacenar granos para alimentar a su familia y cancelar su deuda.
texts.en:
Luis grows corn and beans.  He does this as much for his family’s consumption as he does to sell and get the financial resources to be able to cover the household necessities.  He cultivates rented land, and he learned this work from his parents.  He started to work independently in the year 1999.  The advantage is that the area where he works is suited to agriculture.  He lives in his own house with his life partner and a son who is in the sixth grade.

He will use the loan to pay the rent for the land, to pay to clear the land, and to buy agricultural supplies in order to have everything available when it is just the right time to plant.  He plans to extend the area that he cultivates and to increase his harvests in this way.

His objectives are to store the grains in order to feed his family, and to repay his debt.

loans.use: to pay the rent for the land, to pay to clear the land, and to buy agricultural supplies in order to have everything available when it is just the right time to plant.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es:
Luis inicio la venta de mercancía específicamente ropa, acochados, hace meses atrás, actividad aprendida a través de su padre, buscó esta actividad como una alternativa de generar dinero y como hombre pujante y emprendedor busca desesperadamente el sustento.

Debido al costo de vida tan alto, Luis se ve en la necesidad de generar un mayor volumen de ingresos, es por este motivo que necesita un apoyo económico que la ayude a mejorar la variedad de productos que exhibe y que diariamente ofrece a sus clientes. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de calzado, ropa y acolchados.

Su principal sueño es poder convertirse en el propietario de un almacén con gran variedad de productos y sabe que está por buen camino de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Luis began selling merchandise, specifically clothing and cushions months ago. He learned this work through his father; he sought out this work as an alternative to earn money and as a thriving and enterprising man, he desperately seeks sufficient income. 

Due to the very high cost of living, Luis sees the need to generate more income, and for this reason he needs a loan that will help him to improve the variety of products that he shows and offers daily to his customers. 

He asks for a loan to purchase footwear, clothing, and cushions.

His primary dream is to be able to become the owner of a shop with a great variety of products and he knows that he is on the right path in the hand of Corporación Interactuar.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, clothing, and cushions.

loans.name: Daleidys Del Carmen

texts.es:
Daleidys tiene una panadería la cual atiende junto con su pareja, inicio el negocio en el año 2010 con el objetivo de mejorar las condiciones de vivienda en su hogar.

En el año 2015 tiene una meta de expandir su negocio no solo estructuralmente, también quiere incrementar la producción pero para ello necesita crear demanda entre los clientes.

 Daleidys necesita una ayuda financiera para la compra de. 
•	Batidora industrial 
•	Bandejas de panadería 
•	Un vidrio para la vitrina
•	Insumos para la producción.
El préstamo le ayudara a mejorar los tiempos de producción, la vitrina la necesita para evitar robos de sus productos, las bandejas para calentar más productor y aprovechar al máximo la capacidad del horno, los insumos para preparar los panes.
texts.en:
Daleidys has a bakery that she runs along with her spouse. She started the business in the year 2010, with the goal of improving the living conditions in her home.

Her goal in 2015 is to expand her business, but not just structurally; she also wants to increase production. But for that she needs to create customer demand. 

Daleidys needs a loan for the purchase of:

•	A commercial mixer
•	Baking trays
•	A piece of glass for the display case
•	Production supplies

The loan will help her to improve production time. She needs the glass to keep her products from being stolen; the trays are for more productive heating, and to make the most of the oven’s capacity; and the supplies are for preparing the baked goods.

loans.use: to purchase a commercial mixer, baking trays, a glass for the display case, and production supplies.

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre con gran empuje y emprendimiento, desde hace un tiempo se determino a encontrar una actividad que le generar buenos ingresos y que le permitiera ser independiente, es así como desde hace 11 años inicio con un negocio de bar en el municipio de Medellín.

Es un negocio bastante popular en el sector y se ha convertido en punto de encuentro para adultos.
Con este tiempo en el mercado ya tiene cierto nivel de reconocimiento gracias a la buena gestión de Miguel.

El solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra surtido de bebidas, licores y frituras para aumentar sus ventas, además de comprar sillas.

El ofrece trabajo a un familiar y desea generar otros empleos.
texts.en:
Miguel is a man with a great drive and entrepreneurship. For a while, he has been determined to find a job that generates good income for him and which will allow him to be independent. This is how, 11 years ago, he began with his business of a bar in the municipality of Medellín.

It is a fairly popular business in the area and has become a meeting place for adults.

With this time in the market, he has a certain level of recognition, thanks to Miguel's good management.

He asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of drinks, alcohol, and fried snacks to increase his sales, in addition to purchasing chairs.

He provides a job to a family member and wants to create other jobs.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of drinks, alcohol and fried snacks to increase his sales, in addition to purchasing chairs.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, de 48 años de edad, está casada, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado del ganado con el cual trabajan la tierra.

María, desde muy pequeña trabaja con ganado, porque sus padres tenían ganado y ella los cuidaba; hoy en día ella tiene una yunta de bueyes, los cuales tiene que ir a dejar al potrero todos los días, su esposo le ayuda cuando regresa de trabajar.

El dinero del crédito es para comprar una yunta de chivos para crecerlos y ensayarlos para arar la tierra y de esa manera realizar más rápido los trabajos.

María, sueña con ver a sus hijos graduados y que también aprendan a trabajar duro.
texts.en:
María, age 48, is married.  She lives with her husband and their five children.  She devotes herself to the household chores and the care of the livestock they use to work the land.

María has worked with livestock ever since she was very little because her parents had livestock that she took care of.  She now has a pair of oxen that has to go to the pasture every day.  Her husband helps her when he gets home from work.

The loan is to buy a pair of goats to raise and to teach them to plow the land.  This is a way to do the work more quickly.

María dreams of seeing her children graduate and of them also learning to work hard.

loans.use: to buy a pair of goats to raise and to teach them to plow the land.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 37 years old. He is married with 2 children. 

Julius has had his business farming maize for 8 years. He will be using his loan to purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for his farm, and he hopes this will help him pay his children's school fees. 

Julius' hopes and dreams for the future are to start a new retail shop business to support his farming activities.

Julius is in his 3rd loan cycle and has borrowed a business loan of 60,000 KES to be repaid in 12 months

loans.use: to purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for his farm

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es:
El señor Juan tiene  24  años de edad vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa y sus  padres  se dedica desde hace 03  años a la venta abarrotería en general, vende productos de la canasta básica y sus clientes son todos sus vecinos y personas de las comunidades y aldeas y caseríos.
Don Juan  es un hombre emprendedor y lucha día con día para superarse junto a su familia está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de arroz, azúcar, manteca, frijoles, frescos, café, huevos, jugos, papel higiénico, sardinas, pan, churros,  etc. para surtir su negocio y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.   
Don Juan  con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, uno de sus sueños es hacer crecer su negocio para mejorar su calidad de vida junto con su familia.


San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Mayo del  2015.
texts.en:
Juan, age 24, lives in his own house with his wife and his parents.  He has been selling general groceries for three years.  He sells basic needs items.  His customers are all of his neighbors and people in the surrounding communities, areas, and neighborhoods.

Juan is an enterprising man, and he struggles day to day in order to succeed with his family.  He is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, shortening, beans, soft drinks, coffee, eggs, juices, toilet paper, sardines, bread, and churros, etc. in order to stock his business and to satisfy his customer demand.

With the support of this loan Juan plans to improve his earnings and his quality of life.  One of his dreams is to make his business grow in order to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – May, 2015.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, shortening, beans, soft drinks, coffee, eggs, juices, toilet paper, sardines, bread, and churros, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Cielo Maria

texts.es:
Ella es Cielo es una dama de 33 años de edad, madre de dos hijos una de 3 y otro de 11 años de edad, todo lo que ha conseguido en la vida se lo debe a su esfuerzo, trabajo, nadie le ha dado nada, monto un negocio de carnicería con el que poco a poco ha ido adquiriendo implementos y cosas para su hogar gracias a las ganancias que deja.

Aprendió del negocio gracias a su padre, pero no se quedó trabajando con ese, por el contrario busco su propio camino y monto una carnicería, totalmente apoyada por su padre, quien la guio en la compra del equipo incluso le presto algunos implementos para que por lo menos empezara a realizar su profesión.

Mejorar las ventas, aumentar sus clientes, incrementar su utilidad, optimizar la operación, ser más competitiva son algunos de los objetivos que tiene pensando Cielo con un préstamo que quiere pedir el cual lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos en pie, siendo la carne de cerdo la de más rotación en su carnicería por encima de la de res, pollo o pescado. 

Ella solo quiere que su negocio crezca para tener una buena calidad de vida, ser un ejemplo para sus hijos y ser capaz de pagar la educación de ellos.
texts.en:
Cielo is 33 years old and is the mother of two children: a three-year-old daughter; and an eleven-year-old son. Everything that she has in life is due to her effort and hard work - no one has given her anything. 

She started a butcher business which allowed her little by little to acquire implements and things for her house with the earnings it provided. She learned this business from her father but she did not work with him. Instead, she sought her own path and opened a butcher shop with her father's full support. He guided her in the purchase of equipment and he even lent her some implements so that she could at least begin to practice her profession.

Improving sales, increasing the number of customers, increasing profits, optimizing her operations, and becoming more competitive are some of the goals that Cielo plans to achieve with the loan she wants to request. She will invest the money in the purchase of live pigs, since pork is the meat with the most turnover in her butcher shop, followed by beef, chicken or fish. She only wants her business to grow so that she can have a good quality of life, be an example for her children, and be able to pay for their education.

loans.use: to buy live pigs.

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es:
Pedro vive con su pareja y no tiene hijos, vive felizmente junto con ella en zona rural del municipio de Turbo.
En la actualidad ya cumplió 9 años de estar trabajando con la cría de cerdos de engorde, actividad con la que ha intentado sobrevivir y sacar adelante a su familia para que nunca les falte nada. 

Ha tenido dificultades económicas que han afectado su negocio y que lo han obligado a detener sus actividades en ciertas ocasiones. 

Sueña con mejorar el lugar para la cría de sus animales y también con tener una planta de engorde de cerdos, por esto pasa la solicitud de un préstamo, el cual invertirá en la compra cerdos de engorde los cuales tienen muy buena aceptación por la buena crianza y mantenimiento de los mismos. 

Su calidad de vida  y la de su familia se incrementará en la medida que aumentan las ventas de sus animales y alcance las metas establecidas para  un futuro no lejano.

Con el apoyo de este préstamo Pedro podrá continuar trabajando y podrá darle a su familia todo lo mejor.
texts.en:
Pedro lives with his partner and doesn't have children. He lives happily with her in the rural zone of the municipality of Turbo.

He now has been working for 9 years raising and fattening pigs, work with which he has tried to survive and get his family ahead so they never want for anything.

He has had economic difficulties that have affected his business and have forced him to halt his work on several occasions.

He dreams of improving the place where he raises his animals, and also of having a pig fattening business, so he has submitted his application for a loan, which he will invest in the purchase of pigs to fatten, which have a very good approval for their good raising and care.

His quality of life and that of his family will improve as his animal sales increase and he reaches his established goals in the not-too-distant future.

With the support of this loan, Pedro will be able to continue working and will be able to give his family all the best.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to fatten, which have a very good approval for their good raising and care.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and jembes, or digging hoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy amoxicillin tablets, ibuprofen, menthol products, children’s syrups, vitamins, serums, vials of things like dipyrone, diclofenac, gentamicin, bulbs, and batteries, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Eliana Carolina

texts.es:
Con sus manos trabajadoras, Eliana ha luchado fuertemente para salir adelante y poder realizarse como persona.

Ella es una mujer amable y tiene un negocio de venta de desayunos y almuerzos en el municipio de Medellín.

De este negocio depende su futuro. Es por esta razón que solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de insumos e ingredientes como carne, arroz, verduras, granos, entre otros, así podrá tener una mayor cantidad de insumos disponibles para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Apoya a Eliana a sacar adelante su negocio con un préstamo!
texts.en:
With her working hands, Eliana has fought hard to get ahead and to make something of herself. She is a kind woman who has a business selling breakfasts and lunches in the city of Medellin. Her future depends on this business.

This is why she is applying for a loan so she can buy supplies and ingredients such as meat, rice, vegetables, grains, etc. If she has more supplies on hand she can prepare more meals.

Help Eliana move her business along with a loan!

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients such as meat, rice, vegetables, grains, etc.

loans.name: Dora Noemi

texts.es:
Dora, de 48 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora y responsable, está casada, junto a su esposo tiene 2 hijos, los cuales trabajan para darles lo necesario, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado del ganado; también ayuda a su esposo a cultivar la tierra, así han logrado ayudarle a sus hijos en el estudio, uno de ellos está estudiando cuarto año en la universidad y su hija ya termino su bachillerato.

Dora, desde muy pequeña trabajo con sus padres, luego se dedicó a ayudarle a su esposo a trabajar en el campo y cuando no trabaja en el campo se dedica a los oficios de la casa y al cuido del ganado.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar fertilizantes, abonos y pesticidas para sus cultivos, el crédito le ayudara a tener una mejor producción y más rendimiento en sus cosechas.

Ella, sueña con ver a su hijo graduarse de la universidad y que su otra hija inicie a estudiar en la universidad para que pueda defenderse por sí misma.
texts.en:
Dora, age 48, is a hard-working and responsible person.  She is married, and they have two children.  They work in order to give them what they need.  She devotes herself to the household chores and to caring for the livestock.  She also helps her husband cultivate the land.  This way they have managed to help their children with their education.  One of them is in their fourth year at the university, and their daughter got her high school degree.

Dora worked with her parents ever since she was very small.  Then, she helped her husband work in the field.  When she is not working in the field she does the household chores and cares for the livestock.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, compost, and pesticides for their crops.  The loan will help her to have a better product and a bigger yield from the harvests.

She dreams of seeing her son graduate from the university, and she dreams of her other daughter attending the university so that she is able to take care of herself.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, and pesticides for their crops.

loans.name: Honovi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de pagnes et tissus depuis 2009, Honovi demande un second prêt à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises. Elle souhaite réinvestir dans l'activité et mieux se prendre en charge.
texts.en:
Akossiwa has been a reseller of pagnes and fabrics since 2009. 

She is seeking a second loan from WAGES to stock up on merchandise. 

She plans to reinvest in her activity and better support herself.

loans.use: to buy pagnes and fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 54 years old. He is married with 5 children.

Charles has reared cattle for the past 10 years, and it has been profitable. He has requested a loan from VisionFund Kenya, which he will use to purchase a motorbike as a way of diversifying into a new business.  

Charles' hopes and dreams for the future are to both educate his children to the university level and support his family. As well, he plans to buy a plot of land in town to build premises for his business.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for his business.

loans.name: Laidou  Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les  9 membres du groupe  LAIDOU  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KONDJIGUILA, un des villages de BAYA, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt de campagne avec l’institution.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide avec  MAIMOUNA, 1ére personne debout de   la gauche vers la   droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
La production est vendue au niveau du marche, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  175.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The nine members of the group called Laidou II are married women with an average age of 45 and on average four children each. They all live in polygamous families in Kondjiguila, one of the villages of Baya, third administrative region of Mali. They collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso so as to succeed in their agricultural activities during the rainy season. They are on their fifth seasonal loan with the institution.

Maimouna, the first person standing from left to right in the photo, grows peanuts. With her loan she intends to buy farm supplies and seeds, and pay the fees for tillage to maintain one hectare. Her produce is sold in the market, after the harvest, to a clientele composed of dealers and consumers. She expects to make an average profit of 175,000 F CFA per crop season. This profit will permit her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with their daily expenses.

loans.use: to pay for tillage, farm supplies, and seeds

loans.name: Adassou

texts.fr: Homme de 52ans, Adassou est marié et père de 04 enfants tous scolarisés. Il est tradithérapeute. Ses produits sont connus sur le marché et il les expose dans une baraque. Il sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter une moto afin d'aller livrer les produits à ses clients. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il espère ouvrir d’autres baraques de vente des médicaments et suivre l’éducation des enfants. Il a une ancienneté de 19ans.
texts.en: 52-year-old Adassou is a married father to four children who are all receiving an education. He works as a traditional medical practitioner. He is well-known at the market and he displays his wares throughout his stall. He is requesting a second loan from WAGES in order to purchase a motorcycle which he will use to deliver products to his clients. In the future, he hopes to be able to open other medicine stalls and continue his children's educations. He has 19 years of professional experience.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Bagayogo's Group

texts.fr: Bagayogo qui se trouve sur la photo asseyant à l’extrême gauche, portant un bonnet blanc sur sa tête, est membre d’un groupe de 4 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Keleya au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Bagayogo est le père de 16 enfants âgés de 3 mois à 30 ans, dont 14 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés.  L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer, mais aussi l'agriculture lui permet d'assurer l’autosuffisance pour sa famille, ont incité Bagayogo à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 45 ans. Bagayogo cultive l'arachide, le mais, le mil, le maraîchage sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agriculteur à des difficultés telles que le manque de pluie et de matériel agricoles. Bagayogo entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrit en raison de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro et de l'avis favorable de son entourage sur l'impact positif de myAgro. Cette année Bagayogo effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture de maïs afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 1 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 25 ans que Bagayogo cultive le maïs pour sa valeur vivrière. Bagayogo planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  d'acheter du matériel agricole et de faire de l'élevage de bœufs. Enfin Bagayogo espère aussi pouvoir financer le mariage de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Bagayogo, the man sitting to the far left of the photo wearing a white hat, is a member of a group of four farmers registered with myAgro. They all live and work in the village of Keleya to the south-east of Bamako in Mali. Bagayogo is the father to 16 children aged between three months old and 30 years old, with 14 of them currently receiving an education. He adheres to the family tradition of farming work, which is the main source of revenue and food self-sufficiency for his household. This is what spurred Bagayogo to carry out this work for the past 45 years. He grows peanuts, corn, millet and carries out market gardening on his plot of land, but as a farmer he has to face many difficulties, such as a lack of rainfall and farming supplies. 

Bagayogo has started on his first year with myAgro. He signed up in order to be able to increase his yield through the services offered by myAgro. He heard about the positive impact myAgro has had with other farmers. This year, Bagayogo took out a loan in order to purchase a packet of OPV seeds and fertiliser for growing corn in order to increase his yield on his one-hectare plot of land. He has been growing corn for 25 years as it is a valuable foodstuff. Along with increasing his yield and his revenue, Bagayogo is also planning on purchasing farming supplies and raising cattle. And finally, he also hopes to be able to finance his children's marriages.

loans.use: to purchase a packet of OPV seeds and fertiliser for growing corn, as well as benefiting from agricultural training and techniques from myAgro

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 40 years old. He is married and together with his spouse they have been blessed with four children. 

He has been running a hotel business for six years and makes a monthly income of kshs 50,000.

Robert has requested a loan from VisionFund Kenya which he will be using to purchase furniture and food stuff to sell in order to educate his children.

This is his fifth loan with VisionFund Kenya and the previous loans have been profitable and paid back successfully.  
  
His hopes and dreams for the future are open a restaurant and educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and food stuff to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and jembes for cultivating and preparing for planting so as to meet family needs.

loans.name: Delphine

texts.fr:
60 ans, mère de 10 enfants dont 8 déjà mariés, Delphine est mariée  et son époux ne travaille plus. Elle a encore à sa charge 2 enfants : l’un qui a 16 ans ne va plus à l’école, l’autre exerce un petit métier. 
Avant, Delphine s’adonnait à la vente de friperie comme activité. En raison de son âge, elle a changé d’activité : production, vente de beignet (mofo baolina), des pommes frites et jus naturels. Le point de vente se situe dans un bon emplacement, à côté d’un arrêt bus.
L’objectif est de pouvoir améliorer le lieu de vente  et de ravitailler les revendeurs des produits. Elle prévoit d’accéder son dernier enfant à une formation professionnelle parce qu’il voudrait devenir mécanicien.
texts.en:
Sixty years old and a mother of 10 children, of whom eight are already married, Delphine is married and her husband no longer works. She still takes care of two children--one who is 16 and no longer is in school and one who works.

Before, Marie worked selling used clothing. But because of her age, she changed jobs and now works making and selling beignets (mofo baolina), french fries, and natural juices.

Her stall is well-located next to a bus stop. 

Her goal is to be able to improve her stall and to supply resellers. 

She wants to provide her youngest child vocational training, because he wants to become a mechanic.

loans.use: to buy sugar, oil, eggs, potatoes, and a stall

loans.name: Fotemogoban 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  Fotemogoban 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans, 6 enfants et vivant tous dans des  familles traditionnelles à Kokouna, un des villages de SIKASSO, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution et les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide, avec Binta débout en première position à gauche sur la photo, elle compte acheter avec son prêt, des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 0,75 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et des femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 120.000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi aider la grande famille dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The 10 members of the Fotemogoban 1 group are married women. On average, they are 39 years old, have 6 children, and live in traditional families in Kokouna, a village in Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali).

They work with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, in order to see their farming activities through the rainy season.

This is their sixth loan with the institution, and their previous loans have all been repaid. 

They plant peanuts with Binta standing in the first position to the left of the photo. With her loan, she would like to pay for farm inputs, seeds, and plowing for 0.75 hectares of land. 

After the harvest, she sells in the village in the markets of Sikasso to a clientele comprised of men and women. 

She would like to earn an average monthly income of 120,000 FCFA per season. This income will allow her to pay back her loan and help the family with their daily expenses.

loans.use: pay for farm inputs, seeds, and plowing.

loans.name: Meliza

texts.en:
Meliza has been engaged in pump boat transportation services for more than 10 years now.  She is a married woman with eight children. Her oldest  is 13 and the youngest is 1 year old. She lives in Talibon, Bohol.  Her husband was the one who helps her in the actual operations of the said livelihood.  She is in need of capital to put up another source of income.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 5,000 PHP to acquire capital for food vending and pay for the boat maintenance. Thus, she could able to provide the needs of her children and able to handle her finances as well.

This will boost her transportation livelihood and she will be able to provide quality services to her respective passengers.

Meliza is very grateful for the capital she will avail, and in return, she is doing her best to handle it properly for the welfare of her growing children and also for a sustainable living.

loans.use: to acquire capital for food vending and pay for the boat maintenace

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a hardworking man who sells household items like basins, plates and plastic items. He started the business to cater for the family needs. He desires to educate his children. He is challenged by inadequate capital to pay rent and buy enough plastics for selling. 

Patrick is requesting a loan to buy more household items like jerrycans and jugs to sell.

loans.use: to buy more household items like jerrycans and jugs to sell.

loans.name: Hanane

texts.en:
Hanane is a 39-year-old housewife and the mother of five school-aged children. Her husband owns a garage in town where he specializes in auto body repair.

Hanane is applying for a second loan, this one of 551 USD, through Kiva's field partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay for the remaining year of tuition for her children. She wishes to say that she is thankful for Kiva’s assistance in allowing her to ensure a good educational path for them.

loans.use: to pay the remaining year of tuition for her children.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is a hardworking woman who does cattle trading. She built lodges and a restaurant using the proceeds so as to support her family. She has high hopes of buying a good personal car to help her move to different markets with ease and at her convenience. Droughts and transport are still hindering her business growth. 

She has requested a loan to buy cows to sell.

loans.use: to buy cows to sell.

loans.name: Jackylane

texts.en:
Jackylane earns a living by being a pump boat operator.  She caters services by transporting her respective passenger from one island to the other.  She is a 33-year-old, married woman with seven dependents. Her oldest child is 14 and the youngest is 1 year old.

She is asking for a loan to buy paint and other pump boat maintenance.  These will keep her pump boat at its best. Thus, it could promote smooth travel and be hassle free as well.  Slowly, Jackylane will earn more and start to manage her finances. She will then be able to provide her younger children with nutritious diets. 

She hopes that she can expand her ongoing business and be able to manage another kind of business to become sustainable, and to continue send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy paint and other pump boat maintenance.

loans.name: Hernan Dario

texts.es:
Hernán es un hombre de 46 años de edad, en el momento está pasando por una crisis de la cual quiere salir, como se ve en su local no cuenta con mucho surtido, casi que no tiene para abrir y los clientes no van porque es poco lo que tiene para vender prefieren comprar en una legumbrera donde lo encuentre todo.

El negocio de Hernán lo tiene desde el año 1996 le duele verlo así, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecerlo con frutas y verduras, Hernán es soltero no tiene familia solo su negocio para subsistir.

Apóyalo dale la oportunidad de continuar con el negocio que inicio hace 19 años.
texts.en:
Hernan is a 46 year old man.  At the moment, he is going through a crisis from which he would like to get out.  As you can see, his premises are not well-stocked.  He almost does not have enough to open, and his customers do not come because he does not have much to sell and they prefer to shop in produce stands where they can find everything.

Hernan has had this business since 1996 and it pains him to see it this way.  For this reason, he wants to apply for a loan to stock it with fruits and vegetables.  Hernan is single and does not have family, only his business to sustain.

Support Hernan, to give him the opportunity to continue with this business that he began 19 years ago.

loans.use: to supply his store with fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a hardworking married man with five children living in Masindi, Uganda. He does farming alongside cattle fattening for supplementary income. He started the business to cater for the family needs and ensure that his five children attain an education from good schools. 

He wishes to educate his children, however, inadequate capital and seasonal changes affect his returns. He intends to use the loan facility to pay for labor to clear the garden for planting.

loans.use: to pay for labor to clear the garden for planting.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou, 35 years of age, resides in the town of Talibon, Bohol. She earns a living by means of selling fresh fish. She is married with eight children. Her oldest is 14 and the youngest is 1. Her husband is a fisherman. She has been engaged in fishing for more than 10 years.

She has no capital to enhance the resources for fishing. She decided to take a loan to purchase fishing materials like fishing net, nylon and floaters. These are essential tools that would help improve her yield. Thus, it would enable her to sell more fish and provide her family with good food. Marilou can then continue to send her children to school for a brighter tomorrow. In the future, she  dreams to expand her business to make it productive and profitable.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials like fishing net, nylon and floaters.

loans.name: Zaur

texts.en:
Zaur is 51 years old from Batumi district. He lives with his wife and three children. The only source of income for the family is his wife's monthly salary, working at a local school as a teacher. Zaur is unemployed and wants to start up a business. 

The StartUp program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 2,500 USD. With the received credit, Zaur will purchase a car and will start a taxi business. Zaur is very motivated to have his own stable income.  He hopes that the business will be profitable and he will be able to improve the living conditions of his student children. Zaur awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a car and start a taxi business.

loans.name: Maa Satabhauni Group

texts.en:
Maa Satabhauni Group was started in the year 2015 at Muniguda village of Rayagada district, Odisha, India. There are six active, self-dependent women with an objective of developing their existing businesses as well as their livelihoods. All the members of this group have their own profession and business.

Ranjita is one of them who has taken a great role in her development and their group members’ livelihood improvement. She is the third person from the left hand side with a raised hand in the photo. She is about 27 years old and living with her small family, her husband and two children.

Ranjita has been engaged in the tailoring occupation in her own home of Muniguda for the last five years. Her husband is also helping her to promote the tailoring. Through this business, she earns a monthly income of 6,000 INR. Her opinion is that from this small income, it is very difficult to maintain her family. After that, to get sufficient surplus to reinvest in the business is practically impossible. So, she formed a group for strengthening social relations and to avail herself of a loan for the expansion of her business.

She planned to purchase a bunch of tailoring raw materials and another tailoring machine from the local market. She hopes to get more and more profit from her business expansion and save money for construction of her house and to provide better education to her children.

The other five members of the group are also smart at their professions and are also actively engaged with different professions like a milk business, mixture shop, tailor shop, and vegetable business. With this loan, they hope to boost their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase a bunch of tailoring raw materials and another tailoring machine.

loans.name: Paulo

texts.en:
Paulo is 52 years old.  He is married and blessed with six children. He has been a cattle farmer for the last 15 years and it has been a profitable business. 

Paulo has requested a loan from VisionFund Kenya, which he will be using to purchase additional cattle. His hopes and dreams for the future are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase additional cattle.

loans.name: Firidun

texts.en: Firidun is 47 years old, married for 22 years and has three children. His children are going to school. The family members are living in Fuzuli region, but for more than 23 years they have been IDP (Internally displaced persons) from Fuzuli city. Firidun has been in a trading business; he sells different types of clothes. This is Firidun's second loan and all the loans he repaid on time.  Today, Firidun wants to support his business and therefore he has applied to Komak for a loan of 1,350 AZN (Azerbaijan new manat) to buy more clothes. He says he is thankful to the Kiva organization for aid. In the future, Firidun wants to increase the area of the store and to help his children with their education.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to increase his business. In the future, he wants to increase the area of his store and to help his children with their education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add laborers to assist her in her business.

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es:
Pagar la educación de su hijo es la meta y el motivo por el cual cada día el señor José sale a trabajar con más fuerza, con empeño, con dedicación quiere formar una empresa de elaboración de calzado seria y competitiva en el mercado y para ello necesita tu ayuda, un pequeño préstamo que te lo agradecerá eternamente pues con este comprara una maquina pobadora y una máquina de coser, implementos que necesita para aumentar la producción de calzado, podría generar más empleos aparte de los 4 que da actualmente.

José se compromete a pagar el préstamo puntualmente si le das la oportunidad demostrara con resultados la importancia de esta inversión que lo tiene tan expectante.
texts.en:
The goal of José is to pay for his child’s education, and it’s the reason he goes out to work harder, with determination and dedication. 

He wants to form a serious footwear manufacturing company that’s competitive in the market, and needs your help for that, a small loan for which he will always be thankful.   He will buy a cutting machine and a sewing machine, tools that he needs to increase the production of footwear, and he will be able to create more jobs in addition to the four that he provides currently.

José is committed to paying the loan punctually, and if you give him the opportunity, he will demonstrate with results the importance of this investment that he hopes for so much.

loans.use: to purchase a cutting machine and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Erika Yessenia

texts.es:
Erika, ha tenido una experiencia satisfactoria con el uso de créditos, su tienda presenta un mejor inventario y la venta de atoles continua funcionando, con la buena administración de sus ingresos a logrado incluir la venta de lácteos y se compró un molino nixtamal para ir ampliando su negocio, por el monto no ha tenido problemas para mantenerse trabajando.
Está solicitando un nuevo crédito para reactivar su negocio de una forma rápida y pagando menos al realizar sus compras al mayoreo, invertirá en lácteos, golosinas, boquitas, bebidas, jugos, etc., tendrá mercadería que sus clientes demandan y seguirá dando un buen servicio, espera que las ventas sean mejores.
texts.en:
Erika has had a satisfactory experience using the loans.  Her store has a better inventory, and her “atole” [corn based drink] sales continue.  With the good administration of her earnings she has managed to include the sale of dairy products, and she bought a corn grinding mill in order to expand her business.  So far she has no problems continuing with her work.

She is requesting a new loan to energize her business quickly and to pay less by purchasing in bulk.  She will buy dairy products, candy, snacks, drinks, and juices, etc.  She will have merchandise that her customers demand, and she will continue providing good service.  She expects her sales to improve.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, candy, snacks, drinks, and juices, etc. to meet her customer demand.

loans.name: Maria Paz

texts.es:
María, ha luchado para crecer a sus 4 hijos, ya que su esposo falleció, pero cuando eso sucedió tuvo el apoyo de sus hermanos; ella cultivaba maíz, frijol y sus hermanos le ayudaban, luego viajo hacía Estados Unidos para mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia y mientras estaba allá, uno de sus hijos también se fue y ahora es él quien cubre sus gastos aquí en el país, pues ella regreso hace algunos años. 

María, con el dinero que su hijo le manda lo invierte en cultivos de maíz y frijol para la comida de su familia.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas y poder sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y frijol, aún no ha preparado el terreno, pues no ha llovido y por eso quiere estar preparada para que no se le pase el tiempo de siembra.

Ella, desea que sus hijos sean trabajadores, responsables y que tengan mejores oportunidades de trabajo que las que ella tuvo.
texts.en:
María has struggled to raise her four children since her husband passed away.  However, when this happened she had the support of her sisters.  She grew corn and beans, and her sisters helped her.  She later traveled to the United States in order to improve her family’s financial situation.  When she was there one of her children also went.  Now he is the one who covers their expenses here in the country because she returned after a few years.

María invests the money that her son sends her in her corn and bean crops for her family’s food.  She needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies and to be able to plant 7,000 square meters of corn and beans.  She has not yet prepared the land because it has not rained.  That is why she wants to be prepared so that planting time does not pass her by.

She wishes for her children to be hard-working and responsible.  She wishes that they will have better work opportunities than she had.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to be able to plant 7,000 square meters of corn and beans.

loans.name: Truphena

texts.en:
Truphena, 58 years old, is married and supports four children. She has been in a business of making and selling bricks, earning an income of KES 15,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to put up a shed for bricks as well as adding stock to meet clients' needs. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and improve family living standards. Her hope is to better her life.

loans.use: to put up a shed for bricks as well as adding stock to meet clients' needs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rims, tires, bearings, patches, and grease, etc. in order to provide his customers with better service.

loans.name: Nim's Group

texts.en: Nim is a 28-year-old mother of two small children, living in Kampong Cham province. The sources of her family’s income are from growing rice on one hectare of farmland and working as a factory worker for ten years. She can earn about 42,400KHR per day on average.  Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group of two to take a new loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming. She hopes to gain more yields than last year through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Top Clan Group

texts.en: The Top Clan group is made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. They sell groceries, material and noodles. The featured borrower of this group is named Gifty. She is 43, married and has two children. She did not go to school. Gifty has been selling groceries for 16 years in a kiosk in her neighborhood, which enables her to provide for her family satisfactorily. She buys the groceries from wholesalers and sells them to her customers. Hoping to improve service to her customers, Gifty and the other members of the Top Clan group are requesting their seventh loan from ID-Ghana. This is the seventh time that this group has requested financial help from ID-Ghana in order to raise the standard of their activities. The previous loans were correctly repaid and as usual they will hold each other responsible for repayment of the loan.

loans.use: To buy groceries from wholesalers and sell them to her customers.

loans.name: Carmen Eugenia

texts.es:
Carmen, mayor de edad casada y con 1 hija, originaria de Medellín, es una microempresaria propietaria de su propio negocio el cual consiste en la compra y venta de ropa y productos de uso personal a través de catalogo.

Se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable, también con muchos deseos de superación personal.

Inicio este negocio con fondos propios debido a la necesidad de trabajar y el deseo de mejorar los ingresos en su hogar, tuvo el compromiso de salir adelante con el esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo que ha realizado durante 4 años en el cual ha demostrado su responsabilidad de pago en tiempo y forma, uno de sus sueños es poder llegar a tener un gran negocio. 

Desde muy temprano ella se levanta a iniciar su venta. 

El objetivo de este crédito es para poder comprar más mercadería como; zapatos, ropa interior, cosméticos, productos de uso personal, entre otros etc. 

Carmen se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo económico que Kiva le brinda a las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Carmen is an older lady that is married and has one daughter. She is a native of Medellin, and is a self-made owner of her own business which consists of buying and selling clothes and personal products through catalogs. She is characterized by being a hard-working and responsible woman, and she also has many desires for personal growth.

She started this business with personal funds out of a need to work and the desire to improve the income in her home. She had the dedication to get ahead with the effort and continuous work that she has performed for 4 years. In that time she has demonstrated her responsibility for payment in a timely manner. One of her dreams is to be able to have a great business.

She wakes up very early to begin her sales. The purpose of this loan is to  be able to buy more merchandise such as: shoes, underwear, cosmetics, personal products, and other items, etc. Carmen feels very grateful for the economic support the Kiva brings to the people most in need.
